entry.title: Beyond Prepackaged - Why I Use Linux From Scratch

content.div: Building Linux from Scratch can feel a bit like assembling a complex jigsaw puzzle: frustrating at times, but ultimately supremely rewarding when everything clicks into place.

entry.title: No Blue Screens Here, Just a Bit of Kernel Panic and a Whole Load of Blogging

content.div: An introduction, why would I create a blog, plans for the future, and other random things
